scripts.demo:
node -e "console.log('@playwright/cli 1.0.0
Playwright CLI installed successfully!

Available commands:
  playwright-cli goto <url>
  playwright-cli snapshot
  playwright-cli click [ref=eN]
  playwright-cli fill [ref=eN] <value>
  playwright-cli screenshot --path=<file>

Run playwright-cli --help for full reference.')"
